A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the worst Star Wars movie of All-Time.  No continuity between the old films or even \"The Force Awakens\" for that matter.  Luke Skywalker has been ruined for me and the whole Rey parents thing had the stupidest explanation possible.  Snoke was built up to be a \"G\" and he went out like a complete punk bitch.  Kathleen Kennedy needs to step down out of shame.  Too much political agenda in here and it's obvious.  EPIC FAIL!!!  I was super excited for this film and it was the hugest let down I have ever experienced in my whole life in my 36 year career of film watching even taking down my last predecessor in X-Men the Last Stand.  They honestly need to apologize for releasing this piece of crap to the public.
